## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G28840](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G28840)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GME</u>
- **Gene Name:** GDP-D-mannose 3
- **Description:**   GDP-D-mannose 3,5-epimerase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2150441
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
